content.rendered:
The Rally Side chair is fresh, luxurious and timeless. Upholstered in a genuine leather with a black frame for a distinctive style.

Held in stock for delivery in 2-3 working days. Suitable for commercial use, perfect for bars, clubs and hotels.

This chair pairs well with our industrial tables and we also offer the Rally in a mid height bar stool and a full height bar stool.
